Rohit Sharma:
6.6
Axar to Rohit, out Bowled!! Rohit falls one short of his fifty, but this is a badly needed wicket for DC. Axar kept it flatter and quicker as Rohit came down the pitch, the ball skids through and Rohit is undone by the length, plays all around and loses his off-stump. Thew key was the angle - Axar dragged the length back after that first-ball boundary, kept Rohit guessing and finally gets rid of him. They've taken the strategic break as well. 10.2
Axar to Ishan Kishan, out Caught&Bowled!! That's a screamer and Axar has somehow caught it - dragged short and just outside off. Kishan rocked back and then thumped the pull, hard and flat, to the bowler's left - Axar nonchalantly plucked his left hand out and then holds on. He's chuffed to bits, Kishan looks in absolute disbelief, but he'll have to go. A big wicket, Kishan had just started to change gears. Ishan Kishan c and b Axar 42(23) [4s-4 6s-2]

Suryakumar Yadav:
7.3
Nortje to Suryakumar Yadav, out Caught by (sub)Fraser-McGurk!! Wankhede has been silenced, a two-ball duck for Suryakumar Yadav and MI have lost two wickets on the bounce. Pitched up by Nortje and Suryakumar was shaping for the lofted drive - but his weight was on the back-foot and he inside halved the drive, popped in the air and Fraser-McGurk does well to back pedal and complete a two-handed overhead catch.
